name: ilatex
description: Interactive code visualisations for LaTeX documents.

commands.title: Display a menu to choose how to create a new iLaTeX document
Create an iLaTeX document from the active editor
Create an iLaTeX document from the active editor (disable visualisations)
Recompile the iLaTeX documents that use the file in the active editor

ilatex.enableLocalLogging.markdownDescription: Control the automatic logging of i-LaTeX usage events in .ilatex-logs files that are located **in the same directories** than the edited LaTeX files.
enumDescriptions: Do not log any event at this location.

ilatex.enableCentralisedLogging.markdownDescription: Enable the automatic logging of i-LaTeX usage events **in a unique, centralised directory**. If enabled, log files will be written in the directory specified by `#ilatex.centralisedLoggingDirectoryPath#`.

ilatex.centralisedLoggingDirectoryPath.markdownDescription: Absolute path to the directory where centralised log files should be written. i-LaTeX will attempt to create every missing directory in the path. Only applies when `#ilatex.enableCentralisedLogging#` is enabled.

ilatex.extraLatexmkOptions.markdownDescription: Extra options to append to the `latexmk` command, that is used to compile LaTeX documents.

scripts.build: yarn run build-webview; yarn run build-core
